name: San Francisco Housing Authority
description: Housing vouchers and public housing for low-income San Francisco residents
fullDescription: The San Francisco Housing Authority administers public housing and Section 8 Housing Choice Vouchers for low-income San Francisco residents.
whatTheyOffer:
- Section 8 Housing Choice Vouchers
- Public housing units
- Project-based vouchers
- Special programs for homeless, veterans, and disabled
- HOPE SF public housing redevelopment
howToGetIt:
1. Check SFHA website for waitlist openings
2. Apply when waitlist opens (typically closes quickly)
3. Must meet income limits
4. Must be SF resident or working in SF
5. Wait for name to come up on waitlist
keywords: SFHA, San Francisco Housing Authority, Section 8, public housing, housing voucher, low-income housing, SF, waitlist
